text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
This was a graded race, right?! How<n>did she manage to win
by over ten<n>lengths?!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: I can't believe it either! I know she'sgood, but ten is too good to bereal!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: I can't believe it either! I know she'sgood, but ten is too good to bereal!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Maybe we all have that kind of<n>strength inside us... We've
just<n>decided that it's impossible.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Ooooh! This makes me wanna run!<n>Think I can join a race
right now?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Unfortunately, I don't think that's<n>possible, but I understand
the feeling.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
After all... she's shown us a a way of<n>running that we all
wrote off as mere<n>fantasy!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
At this year's Kinko Sho, Silence<n>Suzuka gives racing fans a
truly<n>awe-inspiring performance.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But it's not just the fans who are<n>wide-eyed with wonder.
Suzuka has<n>just shown every racer that their<n>greatest
dreams can indeed become<n>reality.

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: Seriously? That had to be the best<n>race I've ever seen!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text: No kidding! There's no telling what<n>she'll do next!

text_block_list.name: Fan C
text_block_list.text: That Silence Suzuka's in a league of<n>her own!

If my theory is correct, she holds the<n>answers I've
searched high and low<n>for...
